links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

wikitext.*:
'''Gothic Power''' is an instrumental piece by [[wikipedia:X-Ray Dog|X-Ray Dog]], a music collective specialized in trailer music. ''Gothic Power'' was based on the main theme of [[wikipedia:Requiem for a Dream|Requiem for a Dream]] and appeared on some trailers of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''. 

[[Category:Songs (real-world)]]
